page.title: 12A day at the baths
page.content:
A day at the baths
My class visits the baths every Friday morning with our teacher. A bus comes to the school and takes us to Coatbridge baths which are about 5 minutes away.When we get there we get changed very quickly and then wait at the side of the pool until the attendant tells us what to do. We are put into groups. Group A are those who can swim well, group B are those who can swim a bit and group C are those who cannot swim. There is now only one girl in group C out of 27 pupils. Group A are now learning to dive. It is great fun at the baths and we are always exhausted after the 40 minutes in the water. We can get a drink of hot chocolate from a machine before we go back to school.
